lessonPlans.title: Understanding the Basics of a Bike
lessonPlans.content: Introduction to the parts of the bike, their role and function

steps.description: Identify and learn the function of the different parts of the bike
Understand how to operate each part of the bike

exercises.description: Identify the parts of a bike, their roles, and how they operate

lessonPlans.title: Safety Precautions in Bike Riding
lessonPlans.content: Understanding the necessary safety measures and protocols involved in bike riding

steps.description: Learn about the significance of helmets and protective gear
Understand different road signs and their importance

exercises.description: Identify different road signs and properly fit your helmet and protective gear

lessonPlans.title: Basic Riding Skills
lessonPlans.content: Developing foundational skills necessary for bike riding

steps.description: Learn to balance on the bike

exercises.description: Balance on the bike without pedalling, and then pedal on a flat surface

lessonPlans.title: Advanced Riding Skills
lessonPlans.content: Improving and mastering bike handling and control

steps.description: Learn to navigate corners and turns
Practice riding up and down hills
resources: Climbing and Descending on a Bike

exercises.description: Ride through a course with lots of turns and also ride on hilly terrain

lessonPlans.title: Maintenance and Troubleshooting
lessonPlans.content: Understanding how to care for, maintain, and troubleshoot issues on a bike

steps.description: Learn to inspect your bike regularly and perform basic maintenance tasks
Understand how to troubleshoot common bike issues

exercises.description: Inspect your bike, perform a simple maintenance task, and troubleshoot a minor issue
